text: 2|128|“jeohuiui junim-isiyeo! jeohuileul dangsinkke bogjonghaneun jalo, geuligo jeohuiui husondeul-ui ilbuleul dangsinkke bogjonghaneun gongdongchelo mandeul-eo jusibsio. ttohan jeohuiege jeohuiui gyeongbae bangsig-eul boyeojusigo jeohuiui nwiuchim-eul bad-ajusibsio. jinsillo dangsinkkeseoneun nwiuchineun jaleul bad-ajusineun gajang jaaelousin bun-ibnida.”
